amendment.description: To make available, with an offset, $2,000,000 for other procurement for the Army for medical equipment for the procurement of rapid infusion (IV) pumps.

vote.text: Amendment SA 808 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 808 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Santorum. (consideration: CR S6895; text: S6895) To make available, with an offset, $2,000,000 for other procurement for the Army for medical equipment for the procurement of rapid infusion (IV) pumps.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 808 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Santorum.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 808 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
